name: MAN 'n MOTH
description:
MAN 'n MOTH is a 2D top-down endless running game where you play as a starving caveman joined with your mammoth companion! 

Go on the journey together as caveman and mammoth, bonds your relationship together by switching your role. 

Avoid pitfalls and bring foods back to your family! 

Input ActionsKeySwitch LaneLeft/Right Arrow KeysChange FormSpace Bar
Goal

Reach the farest distance as you can!

Collect foods as a caveman. 

Avoid pitfalls as a mammoth. 

Keep track of your relationship meter, gain boost when your meter is at yellow area but make sure to not exhaust your companion.
